name: Md Shakil Tanvir
headline: Embedded Systems Team Lead • Researcher • Entrepreneur
subtitle: Defender ROV • Air-Gapped Crypto Hardware Wallet • STM32 ECU • Advanced Metering Infrastructure (DLMS/COSEM, STS)
about: I am an Embedded Systems Engineer leading a team focused on building robust and secure embedded solutions. My work spans cryptography-based hardware wallets, automotive ignition/ECU systems, military-grade ROVs, and large-scale smart energy solutions (AMI, DLMS/COSEM, STS). With deep expertise in communication protocols (UART, SPI, I2C, CAN, Modbus, MQTT, TCP/IP), cryptography, blockchain, and IoT systems, I combine research with practical engineering to deliver real-world impact across industries including defense, energy, and automation.
